Reviews.Content: just love Bali       pizza by the pool
Reviews.Author: Janice77

Reviews.Content: Good Pool Starting off on a positive, the staff are so friendly, extremely helpful, the pool is great with comfy sun loungers, cheap room service and the Rama Cheese Burger was very satisfying!The negatives include the breakfast - if you love your breakfast, want good quality and a variety do not stay here. It is very budget and basic. We booked the Garden Villa and although spacious, it looked very tired and dated, so we upgraded (yes we had to pay) to the Pool Suite which is very nice. Hard mattress and pillows though.There were a lot of renovations happening while we were there which was really disappointing. The pizzeria right next to the pool was being worked on, cornered off by fibro sheets and the occasional chainsaw and hammering as background music while we tried to relax at the pool.The Tennis courts were being renovated so not in use.Then they decided to empty out the pond that surrounded the restaurant which was messy and smelly from old water and dying coy fish.Outside the resort is dirty, crumbling concrete fences, a new holiday inn resort being built opposite, there were bull dozers and machinery on the beach and emptied shops used as rubbish dumps in between the Rama and the 5* Ma Jolly Restaurant with old food  waste spilling onto the street. It wreaked.There are no restaurants apart from Ma Jolly (which looked lovely) within a short walking distance so we spent most of our time in taxi going to places in Seminyak which were brilliant.Maybe when all the renovations are finished and the Restaurant actually takes note of the breakfast complaints and changes, this would be a moderate place to stay. Close to airport and to kuta.Would we stay again? No.
Reviews.Author: ChelseyPerth

Reviews.Content: Rama Beach Resort looked great       Our plunge pool
Reviews.Author: Jademac05

Reviews.Content: Very memorable When we arrived at Rama Beach, we were told that we were given an upgrade to a Suite Pool Villa. We were overjoyed. We got a huge private pool, Flat screen TV in bathroom, Welcome Fruits and Drink and a free 30 minute massage at the Spa. Only problem is the distance, which was about 30 minutes walk from the Kuta centre. We mostly used taxi but you need to negotiate properly before stepping in. We would recommend this hotel to honeymooners who just want to laze and relax in the hotel area.
Reviews.Author: Bumplin

Reviews.Content: Bad procedure!!!!!!1 I've been stayed with my husband last June, and when we did check in, the front office did swipe the credit card amount Rp. 6,500,000.Then everything was going well, all staff were good, BUT...when we did check out, we decided to pay cash, and they gave us the receipt for the credit card. Then we just tore up the receipt, as they gave us both of the receipt ( with the copy ). We paid use USD. And it was more than Rp. 6,500,000 we've spent there. ( i still have the receipt about how much we had to pay for everything there ).We paid use USD ( USD 800 ) and we got the change in Rupiah. The total amount was 7, 038, 250. Our arrived date was 12/06/2008 and the departure date was : 15/06/2008.But then after that, they didn't even open the blocking for the credit card, made that as a pending transaction. And then, i called the hotel, and they just said every single non sense!!!!I just wanted you to open the block ( confirm that we didn't use the credit card for the payment ) as we didn't use credit card but CASH. CASH. CASH.But, you just can say i have to call the bank by myself and ask the bank to release the pending transaction. And OH MY GOD, HELLO ??? What's the relation with the bank ? The bank would just open and release that if you opened the blocking. And you just say why i did tear up the receipt ?? HELLO AGAIN...In every hotel, we do that one, and they're professional. THEY GAVE US THE RECEIPT BUT THEY'VE ALREADY MADE COPY TO THAT RECEIPT, so they can just call what bank who has that merchant and tell that they want them to open the blocking and the bank ( who has the merchant ) would just release that and cancel or open the blocking and we can use our credit card again.If it's only Rp, 1,000,000 i wouldn't give a care, but it's Rp. 6,500,000. And we're not rich and also the mistake and the fault, the failure was from the HOTEL FRONT OFFICE!!!!!So i need your responsibility. I want our money back!!!!!!!!!!!You are not proffesional and i surely dissapointed ever thought it's a good hotel. But, i was wrong. So very wrong.
Reviews.Author: Upsetanddissapointed

Reviews.Content: Loved Rama Beach Resort and Villa       The private plunge pool at our villa
Reviews.Author: Bunny1982

Reviews.Content: Would not stay there again Too far out, the breakfast was the worse I have ever had, was meant to be amercian breakfast the sausages, potatoes, rice and noodles where stone cold every day yuk, no bacon unless you paid for it.I would not go back there and 10 other friends that came a week after us said they would not go there again either.
Reviews.Author: shazteds

Reviews.Content: Beautiful hotel I am a travel agent and stayed here one night on an educational trip. We got an upgrade to the Garden Villa and it was by far the nicest place we stayed on our trip. The bathroom was excellent, large and clean. The pool is fantastic and they have a good Spa. We inspected other rooms in the hotel, including the Pool Villa, Family Villa, Garden Bungalow and Deluxe Room, and all were very nice. Although I would recommend paying slightly more to get a nicer room. Even though this resort is 5 minutes south of the main Kuta area, there are shuttle buses that run, and taxis are only a couple of dollars anyway. I would definitely stay here again.
Reviews.Author: chica_brandybuck

Reviews.Content: Worst hotel - never again! Can't believe we stayed at the same hotel as the reviews below. We booked this hotel - (would never call it a resort, maybe a back packers hotel would be more appropriate )- from the Rama Beach website. It was for my 50th birthday and we chose a plunge pool villa that was quoted at US$195 (June 2006). Now it is advertised at US$250.(Oct 2006) We had negotiated a price by email (US$100) and were so looking forward to our 2 night stay in the luxury villa. We were surprised on arrival that the reception staff wanted us to pay upfront for the villa. We said no, we wanted to see the villa first. When we were shown the villa our jaws dropped. It was very dated, dirty, air con didn't work, backed onto a smelly dirty street and looked nothing like the pictures on the website. We returned to the small reception area and complained to the manager that this was not the villa we booked and there was no way this villa could possibly be worth our agreed price, let alone the published price.They immediately offered us an upgrade, which did look more like the pictures on the website. It was a suite villa and the quoted price was US$350 a night. We reluctantly agreed to take it for US$105 a night as we were tired and felt so disappointed. Lucky we had only booked for 2 nights! The hotel area had limited facilities and in need of major renovation. The pool area is very nice.We decided to have dinner in the only restaurant on our first night and we were the only ones in the restaurant.! Bali is quiet but we did think this was strange. Dinner was ok. We discovered the reason why the restaurant was empty, the next morning at breakfast. On previous visits to Bali we have stayed at 6 other resorts and have had breakfast at all of them. This breakfast was shocking and extremely limited. The only thing we ate was the omelette and the toast - the sausages were a funny colour, the potatoes looked like they were soaking in fat and that was about it.I am writing this review so that other travellers don't get out by this hotel. If you only want a cheap hotel this place would be fine. But when a hotel quotes such expensive rates you expect a certain standard. I would avoid this hotel. There are so many other resorts in Kuta/Tuban that are reasonably priced and have a much, much higher standard of cleanliness, facilities and food.
Reviews.Author: susie2shoes

Reviews.Content: Absolute Luxury!!! My partner and i stayed at the Rama Beach Resort and Spa for 10 nights and had the best time ever!! The staff were great, learnt our names after 2 days and always had a smile on their face. The hotel itself was amazing, gorgeous pool, loveley big rooms and the breakfast was fantastic. The hotel is not right in the centre of Bali which is great, cause it is a little quieter. It is however only a 5-10 walk to the main streets in Kuta. Would definatly stay there again and reccommend to all!!
Reviews.Author: tahnee87

Reviews.Content: Pure Luxury, would stay again!! We stayed here in July 2004 and had the best time. The hotel staff were friendly and helpful. The rooms were large and well decorated in Balinese style. Upon arrival there were fresh flowers on our beds and the room was always clean.The grounds are large and very leafy (frangipani trees everywhere), and you could easily spend all day relaxing by the pool (we even got cocktails at the swim-up bar)The Rama Beach is not the closest to Kuta but with the free shuttle, or a 20minute walk your there in no time.Breakfast is fantastic, you can get your omelete made fresh which ever way you like them by the cook right there. There was such a variety of things to eat - fresh fruit, cereal, toast, even creme caramel and cake (which we just had to try, ok we had it every day) And it never ran out, if the dish was empty there was always someone there ready to replace it.We would definately stay here again!!
Reviews.Author: The_Travelling_Duo

Reviews.Content: Always reliable We stay at this hotel every trip to Bali. It is located within walking distance of Kuta and the beach is just down the road. The rooms have been updated and now there are pool villas as well as the regular cottage rooms. Staff is great. Breakfast is the only meal we ever have here as there are too many places in Bali to eat. Quiet location. You can't go wrong for the money.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
